snippet: An opposition presidential candidate who was shot and wounded Thursday outside his home in the capital said Friday that he would probably seek to postpone the Feb. 18 election.
abstract: Paruir A Airikyan, opposition presidential candidate in Armenia who was shot and wounded outside his home in capital city Yerevan, says that he will probably seek to postpone Feb 18 election.
lead_paragraph: An opposition presidential candidate who was shot and wounded Thursday outside his home in the capital said Friday that he would probably seek to postpone the Feb. 18 election.

headline.main: Wounded Candidate in Armenia Likely to Postpone Vote
headline.print_headline: Armenia: Wounded Candidate Likely to Postpone Vote
